metadata.description: Horison plugin marketplace — agents, MCP servers, skills, and workflows for PE deal intelligence on GCP, Supabase, Neo4j, and Langfuse

plugins.name: horison-defaults
plugins.description: Horison platform: 13 MCP servers, 10 agents (GCP, Supabase, Neo4j, Langfuse, KG pipeline, code review, security), MCP usage skills, memory, and hooks. One install gets everything.

plugins.name: python-development
plugins.description: Python 3.12+, FastAPI, Django, async patterns, testing, packaging, and 16 specialized skills

plugins.name: javascript-typescript
plugins.description: JS/TS with advanced types, Node.js patterns, testing, and modern ES6+

plugins.name: backend-development
plugins.description: API design, GraphQL, microservices, CQRS, event sourcing, saga patterns, and Temporal workflows

plugins.name: frontend-mobile-development
plugins.description: Next.js App Router, React state management, Tailwind design systems, React Native

plugins.name: developer-essentials
plugins.description: Git workflows, SQL optimization, error handling, auth patterns, debugging, code review, monorepo management

plugins.name: llm-application-dev
plugins.description: LangChain/LangGraph, RAG, vector search, embeddings, prompt engineering, and LLM evaluation

plugins.name: cloud-infrastructure
plugins.description: AWS/Azure/GCP architecture, Terraform modules, service mesh, cost optimization, multi-cloud

plugins.name: kubernetes-operations
plugins.description: K8s manifests, Helm charts, GitOps, security policies

plugins.name: devops
plugins.description: CI/CD pipelines, GitHub Actions, observability, monitoring, incident response, and deployment validation

plugins.name: database
plugins.description: PostgreSQL schema design, SQL optimization, migrations, and cloud database tuning

plugins.name: data-engineering
plugins.description: ETL pipelines, Spark optimization, dbt transformations, Airflow DAGs, data quality

plugins.name: security
plugins.description: SAST, threat modeling, OWASP Top 10, SOC2/HIPAA/GDPR compliance, secrets scanning

plugins.name: testing
plugins.description: Unit testing, TDD workflows, red-green-refactor, and test automation

plugins.name: code-quality
plugins.description: Code review, refactoring, tech debt cleanup, and performance analysis

plugins.name: debugging
plugins.description: Interactive debugging, error analysis, trace debugging, and distributed system debugging

plugins.name: documentation
plugins.description: OpenAPI specs, Mermaid diagrams, ADRs, changelogs, and tutorial generation

plugins.name: git-pr-workflows
plugins.description: Git workflow automation, PR enhancement, and team onboarding

plugins.name: conductor
plugins.description: Context-Driven Development: structured Context → Spec → Plan → Implement workflow

plugins.name: agent-teams
plugins.description: Multi-agent teams for parallel code review, debugging, and feature development

plugins.name: framework-migration
plugins.description: Framework upgrades, React modernization, Angular migration, dependency updates, database migration
